mainstay.translation[1].definitions[0].d: the most important part of something, that makes it possible for it to be successful or to continue to exist
mainstay.translation[1].definitions[0].e: Cod fishing was the mainstay of the Newfoundland economy, accounting for 21% of all jobs.
